mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(id, password, name, email, address, phone, nickname, gender, resident) VALUES(#{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{nickname}, #{gender}, #{resident})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM member WHERE id=#{id} AND password=#{password}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET nickname=#{nickname}, email=#{email}, phone=#{phone}, phone=#{phone} WHERE id=#{id} AND password=#{password}
